turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order three pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a pepperoni pizza, a cheese pizza, and a mushroom and olive pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what size did you want those pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: medium for all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you are ordering 3 medium pizzas, one pepperoni, one cheese, and one mushroom and olives, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And, can I get them all with thick crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me add that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up, or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like it delivered.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note your total does not include tip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be delivered in 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, can I change that for pickup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, one moment while i edit that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
